extendedInfo.description: Monster Pinball HD is available now and it's awesome. Jared, Touch ArcadeA perfect example of the crazy, off-the-wall steel ball bashing action is the recently upscaled Monster Pinball HD 148apps.comMonster Pinball HD wonât transport you to 1984, but it will give you plenty of pinball action in a new and exciting way PadGadget.comThe original pinball release arrived back in May of 2009 and was well received by iOS gamers who appreciated its whacky pinball table designs and ultra-fast physics... One should separately mention the incredible art style of the Monster Pinball HD which amazingly combines Pixarâs cheerfulness and the gloominess of Tim Burton. AppleStaple.com...Monster Pinball HD brings a whole new experience of amazing Achievement goals, Stunning HD graphics, Six connected pinball tables, Single Table mode achievements and more crazy sounds. We've really brought this recent pinball classic (from the iPhone) into the future with a whole lot more fun, style and energy...we hope you like it as much as we do! Features include: â¢ Achievements section with 29 of its own new goals.â¢ Single table play mode is now set as 6 of the achievements - Achieve the goal on a given table and you can then select to only play on that table if you wish.â¢ Over 500 goals with in play achievement activations.â¢ Stunning HD graphics â¢ Crazy sound effectsâ¢ Fast, Medium, Slow modesâ¢ Six interconnected tablesâ¢ Highscore table

reviews.title: the best pinball game
reviews.comment: ..for android hands down.  I had to route my device and partition my memory card on my LG optimus just to play it.  It plays like a dream.
reviews.author: Dave Whitman

reviews.title: Interesting
reviews.comment: An interesting take on pinball with a few issues. 1. It\'s huge, add app2sd support 2. The flippers are a little soft feeling. They need to be more snappy 3. Occasional jitters. Only noticeable because the game is so fast 4. No idea what I\'m doing! Is there a guide?
reviews.author: Matthew King

reviews.title: Good game but...
reviews.comment: I like the game a lot but there are some things which prevent it from being a 5 star. Most importantly there are bugs. Sometimes the ball gets stuck and there is no way of getting it back. The only exception I found was when the ball is hovering above the upper exit of the center tube it is possible to recover it by changing the games speed back and forth. Please make a shake button like most other pinball games. Also I\'d like to have the possibility to change the starting table.
reviews.author: Yelve Yakut

reviews.title: Excellent Pinball
reviews.comment: Matmi is a developer that understands what makes pinball fun: the noise, the spectacle, and ball physics you can trust.  You can set the speed to learn the tables, and turn off the music to play your own.  All six tables are slick, fast, fun and sound fantastic.  Above all however, the game doesn\'t need to cheat with questionable physics to overcome poor table design.  Monster Pinball is very different, and a ton of silly fun.
reviews.author: NFG man

reviews.title: Fun game with lots of surprises
reviews.comment: Fun pinball game with fast action and lots of little touches to keep the game interesting. Would recommend!!
reviews.author: Jeffrey Wal

reviews.title: Old and not updated but still very good.
reviews.comment: Great sound effects and ability to change speed of ball.
reviews.author: Michael Johnson

reviews.title: Better than the Symbian version
reviews.comment: Used to have his game for my Symbian version. The Android is so much better.
reviews.author: Kamal Othman

reviews.comment: not enough space on my phone
reviews.author: Manny St Peter

reviews.title: Prett slick
reviews.comment: I\'m more a fan of the traditional, (real), pinball tables, but this worth checking out if you\'re a pinball fan at all.  Pretty challenging at points and a lot to do with well designed, varied tables.
reviews.author: Garrett Groce

reviews.title: Galaxy note 2
reviews.comment: NO SOUND on my Samsung galaxy note 2 , if it made some kind of sound it might be
reviews.author: gary fletcher
